segments.text: I notice the kitchen setup right away, with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But suddenly, the overflowing sink catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down—how did that happen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate seems totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look so everyday.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the left, kids at the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool—wow, that's precarious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, the little rascal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're so clever sneaking them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This place could turn into a skating rink soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mix of ordinary and chaotic all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
